description: Main entry point for a Flutter application implementing a kindergarten management system. Sets up environment variables, initializes database, and defines root widget with providers and app theme.

classes.name: KindergartenApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up providers and theming for the Flutter application.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes environment and database, then runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method constructing the widget tree with providers and MaterialApp.
